message: Hey Everyone! As some of you know I'm going to New York on a mission trip over Spring Break! A T-shirt company is sponsoring me for the month of February, so when you buy a shirt part of the proceeds go to my trip!  http://www.gospelteez.com/store/c1/Featured_Products.html . Here's the link to get one if you'd like, they're super awesome shirts, I have a few myself! (Because online shopping is a bad, yet wonderful habit.)
